/* sourabh1024  */
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

#define si(n)		(scanf("%d",&n))
#define pi(n)		(printf("%d",n))
#define sl(n)		(scanf("%I64d",&n))
#define pl(n)		(printf("%I64d",n))

#define lli long long int
#define ii pair<int,int>
#define vii pair< ii ,int>
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
using namespace std;

int n,t;
int mleft [105],mright[105];
bool illusions[105][105];
bool visited[105];

bool dfs(int u) {
	if(visited[u])	return false;
	visited[u] = true;
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
		if(illusions[u][i]) {
			//if(visited[i] ) continue;
			if( mright[i] == -1 || dfs(mright[i]) ) {
				mright[i] = u;
				mleft[u] = i;
				return true;
			}
		}
	}
	return false;
}

int main()
{
	memset(illusions,false,sizeof(illusions));
	memset(mleft,-1,sizeof(mleft));
	memset(mright,-1,sizeof(mright));
	
	int x,y;
	cin>>n;
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--) {
		cin>>x>>y;
		illusions[x-1][y-1] = true;
	}
	
	bool done = true;
	do {
		done = true;
		memset(visited,false,sizeof(visited));
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			if(mleft[i]==-1 && dfs(i))
				done = false;
		}
	}while(!done);
	
	int cnt =0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
		if(mleft[i]!=-1)	cnt++;
	}
	
	cout<<cnt<<endl;
	return 0;
}
